category.name: Workflow
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: WORKFLOW_adhoc_process
preference.preference_description: Site preference flag indicating if adhoc process functionalities are enabled. Valid values are 0/1/2. 0 - Enabled for all users. 1 - Enabled only if the user is a system administrator or user granted edit access to Workflow Designer. 2 - Enabled for System Adminitrators and Group admins or user granted edit access to Workflow Designer(default).
